fr.prcaen.rxbilling3

Class RxBillingClient

  • fr.prcaen.rxbilling3.RxBillingClient

  • public class RxBillingClient

    • Method Detail

      • acknowledgePurchaseAsync

        @CheckReturnValue
 @NonNull
 @SchedulerSupport
 @NotNull
public static io.reactivex.Completable acknowledgePurchaseAsync(@NotNull
                                                                                                                         com.android.billingclient.api.BillingClient $receiver,
                                                                                                                         @NotNull
                                                                                                                         com.android.billingclient.api.AcknowledgePurchaseParams params)

        Acknowledge in-app purchases.

        Note: acknowledgePurchaseAsync does not operate by default on a particular Scheduler.

        Error handling: If Billing result is not BillingResponseCode.OK, the emitter will deliver exception AcknowledgePurchaseException.

        Parameters:
        params - Params specific to this load request AcknowledgePurchaseParams.
        Returns:
        Completable.
        See Also:
        acknowledgePurchaseAsync, Scheduler, BillingResponseCode.OK, exception AcknowledgePurchaseException, BillingClient.acknowledgePurchase

      • consumeAsync

        @CheckReturnValue
 @NonNull
 @SchedulerSupport
 @NotNull
public static io.reactivex.Single<java.lang.String> consumeAsync(@NotNull
                                                                                                                          com.android.billingclient.api.BillingClient $receiver,
                                                                                                                          @NotNull
                                                                                                                          com.android.billingclient.api.ConsumeParams consumeParams)

        Consumes a given in-app product. Consuming can only be done on an item that's owned, and as a result of consumption, the user will no longer own it.

        Note: consumeAsync does not operate by default on a particular Scheduler.

        Error handling: If Billing result is not BillingResponseCode.OK, the emitter will deliver exception ConsumeException.

        Parameters:
        consumeParams - Params specific to consume purchase.
        Returns:
        a Single that emits the purchase token that was (or was to be) consumed.
        See Also:
        consumeAsync, Scheduler, BillingResponseCode.OK, exception ConsumeException, BillingClient.consumeAsync

      • isFeatureSupportedAsync

        @CheckReturnValue
 @NonNull
 @SchedulerSupport
 @NotNull
public static io.reactivex.Single<java.lang.Boolean> isFeatureSupportedAsync(@NotNull
                                                                                                                                      com.android.billingclient.api.BillingClient $receiver,
                                                                                                                                      @NotNull
                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String feature)

        Check if specified feature or capability is supported by the Play Store.

        Note: isFeatureSupportedAsync does not operate by default on a particular Scheduler.

        Warning: This method should be executed on MainThread, it will throw IllegalStateException if not.

        Error handling: If Billing result is not BillingResponseCode.OK or BillingResponseCode.FEATURE_NOT_SUPPORTED, the emitter will deliver exception IsFeatureSupportedException.

        Parameters:
        feature - Params specific to this load request FeatureType.
        Returns:
        a Single that emits true if feature is not supported, false otherwise..
        See Also:
        isFeatureSupportedAsync, Scheduler, IllegalStateException, BillingResponseCode.OK, BillingResponseCode.FEATURE_NOT_SUPPORTED, exception IsFeatureSupportedException, BillingClient.isFeatureSupported

      • isReadyAsync

        @CheckReturnValue
 @NonNull
 @SchedulerSupport
 @NotNull
public static io.reactivex.Single<java.lang.Boolean> isReadyAsync(@NotNull
                                                                                                                           com.android.billingclient.api.BillingClient $receiver)

        Checks if the client is currently connected to the service, so that requests to other methods will succeed.

        Note: isReadyAsync does not operate by default on a particular Scheduler.

        Warning: This method should be executed on MainThread, it will throw IllegalStateException if not.

        Returns:
        a Single that emits true if the client is currently connected to the service, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        isReadyAsync, Scheduler, IllegalStateException, BillingClient.isReady

      • launchBillingFlowAsync

        @CheckReturnValue
 @NonNull
 @SchedulerSupport
 @NotNull
public static io.reactivex.Single<com.android.billingclient.api.BillingResult> launchBillingFlowAsync(@NotNull
                                                                                                                                                               com.android.billingclient.api.BillingClient $receiver,
                                                                                                                                                               @NotNull
                                                                                                                                                               android.app.Activity activity,
                                                                                                                                                               @NotNull
                                                                                                                                                               com.android.billingclient.api.BillingFlowParams params)

        Initiate the billing flow for an in-app purchase or subscription.

        It will show the Google Play purchase screen. The result will be delivered via the PurchasesUpdatedListener interface implementation reported to the BillingClient.Builder.setListener.

        Note: launchBillingFlowAsync does not operate by default on a particular Scheduler.

        Warning: This method should be executed on MainThread, it will throw IllegalStateException if not.

        Parameters:
        activity - An activity reference from which the billing flow will be launched.
        params - Params specific to the request BillingFlowParams.
        Returns:
        a Single that emits a BillingResult.
        See Also:
        PurchasesUpdatedListener, BillingClient.Builder.setListener, launchBillingFlowAsync, Scheduler, IllegalStateException, BillingClient.launchBillingFlow

      • launchPriceChangeConfirmationFlowAsync

        @CheckReturnValue
 @NonNull
 @SchedulerSupport
 @NotNull
public static io.reactivex.Completable launchPriceChangeConfirmationFlowAsync(@NotNull
                                                                                                                                       com.android.billingclient.api.BillingClient $receiver,
                                                                                                                                       @NotNull
                                                                                                                                       android.app.Activity activity,
                                                                                                                                       @NotNull
                                                                                                                                       com.android.billingclient.api.PriceChangeFlowParams params)

        Initiate a flow to confirm the change of price for an item subscribed by the user.

        When the price of a user subscribed item has changed, launch this flow to take users to a screen with price change information. User can confirm the new price or cancel the flow.

        Note: launchPriceChangeConfirmationFlowAsync does not operate by default on a particular Scheduler.

        Warning: This method should be executed on MainThread, it will throw IllegalStateException if not.

        Parameters:
        activity - An activity reference from which the billing flow will be launched.
        params - Params specific to the request PriceChangeFlowParams.
        Returns:
        Completable.
        See Also:
        launchPriceChangeConfirmationFlowAsync, Scheduler, IllegalStateException, BillingClient.launchPriceChangeConfirmationFlow

      • queryPurchaseHistoryAsync

        @CheckReturnValue
 @NonNull
 @SchedulerSupport
 @NotNull
public static io.reactivex.Single<java.util.List> queryPurchaseHistoryAsync(@NotNull
                                                                                                                                     com.android.billingclient.api.BillingClient $receiver,
                                                                                                                                     @NotNull
                                                                                                                                     java.lang.String skuType)

        Returns the most recent purchase made by the user for each SKU, even if that purchase is expired, canceled, or consumed.

        Note: queryPurchaseHistoryAsync does not operate by default on a particular Scheduler.

        Error handling: If Billing result is not BillingResponseCode.OK, the emitter will deliver exception QueryPurchaseHistoryException.

        Parameters:
        skuType - The type of SKU, either "inapp" or "subs" as in SkuType
        Returns:
        a Single that emits the list of PurchaseHistoryRecord (even if that purchase is expired, canceled, or consumed - up to 1 per each SKU).
        See Also:
        queryPurchaseHistoryAsync, Scheduler, BillingResponseCode.OK, exception QueryPurchaseHistoryException, BillingClient.queryPurchaseHistoryAsync

      • queryPurchasesAsync

        @CheckReturnValue
 @NonNull
 @SchedulerSupport
 @NotNull
public static io.reactivex.Single<java.util.List> queryPurchasesAsync(@NotNull
                                                                                                                               com.android.billingclient.api.BillingClient $receiver,
                                                                                                                               @NotNull
                                                                                                                               java.lang.String skuType)

        Get purchases details for all the items bought within your app. This method uses a cache of Google Play Store app without initiating a network request.

        Note: queryPurchasesAsync does not operate by default on a particular Scheduler.

        Error handling: If Billing result is not BillingResponseCode.OK, the emitter will deliver exception RetrievePurchasesException.

        Parameters:
        skuType - The type of SKU, either "inapp" or "subs" as in SkuType
        Returns:
        a Single that emits the list of Purchase.
        See Also:
        queryPurchasesAsync, Scheduler, BillingResponseCode.OK, exception RetrievePurchasesException, BillingClient.queryPurchases

      • querySkuDetailsAsync

        @CheckReturnValue
 @NonNull
 @SchedulerSupport
 @NotNull
public static io.reactivex.Single<com.android.billingclient.api.SkuDetails> querySkuDetailsAsync(@NotNull
                                                                                                                                                          com.android.billingclient.api.BillingClient $receiver,
                                                                                                                                                          @NotNull
                                                                                                                                                          java.lang.String sku,
                                                                                                                                                          @NotNull
                                                                                                                                                          java.lang.String skuType)

        Perform a network query to get SKU details.

        Note: querySkuDetailsAsync does not operate by default on a particular Scheduler.

        Error handling: If Billing result is not BillingResponseCode.OK, the emitter will deliver exception QuerySkuDetailsException.

        Parameters:
        sku - Specify the SKU that is queried for as published in the Google Developer console.
        skuType - Specify the type SkuType of SKUs we are querying for.
        Returns:
        a Single that emits a SkuDetails.
        See Also:
        querySkuDetailsAsync, Scheduler, BillingResponseCode.OK, exception QuerySkuDetailsException, BillingClient.querySkuDetailsAsync

        Error handling: If Billing result is not BillingResponseCode.OK, the emitter will deliver exception QuerySkuDetailsException.
